alert.note: Alert for Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 3:20AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Ziebach County through 345 AM MDT... At 319 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Intersection of Highway 63 and BIA Road 8, or 14 miles south of Eagle Butte, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Intersection of Highway 63 and BIA Road 8 around 325 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include South Eagle Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
